definition: the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods/Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4

sentences.english: Large Seal Script here refers to the Spring and Autumn period of Qin prevailed in the text.
sentences.chinese: 这里的大篆指通行于春秋战国时期的秦国文字。

sentences.english: Yichang has a long history, the Warring States period Chu Cisse.
sentences.chinese: 宜昌历史悠久，春秋战国时期为楚西塞。

sentences.english: However, the sprout of ancient Chinese rural finance emerged in the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period.
sentences.chinese: 但中国古代农村金融萌芽还是出现于春秋战国时期。

sentences.english: The Spring-autumn and Warring States Period is a very important time of social reforms in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 因为春秋战国恰恰是生产力迅速发展的时候。

sentences.english: The SpringAutumn and Warring States Period is the time of the beginning of the system of Chinas council.
sentences.chinese: 中国的幕府制度，起源于春秋战国时期的养士之风。

sentences.english: The lotus culture formed in the period from West Zhou Dynasty to the Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 荷文化形成于西周至春秋战国时期。

sentences.english: Spring and Autumn and Warring states periods were golden periods of private business development.
sentences.chinese: 春秋战国是私商发展的黄金时期。

sentences.english: Spring and Autumn period, Longwan become more jurisdiction in the country.
sentences.chinese: 春秋战国时期，龙湾成为越国辖地。

sentences.english: Chinese and Western aesthetics had emerged separately in the Spring and Autumn Period of Chinese history and Greek and Roman Period.
sentences.chinese: 中西方美学分别产生于春秋战国与古希腊罗马时期。

sentences.english: This method had been used until the Spring-autumn Warring period.
sentences.chinese: 这一方法在历史上一直沿用至春秋战国时期。

sentences.english: Shanxi belonged to Jin State in Spring and Autumn Period, so it is abbreviated in Jin.
sentences.chinese: 山西曾归属于春秋战国时期的晋国，也因此简称为晋。

sentences.english: Minyue culture is the culture formed by the people in Minyue from the Spring and Autumn Period to the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 闽越文化即春秋战国至汉武帝时期闽越人创造的文化。

sentences.english: Xiang embroidery has a long history and can be dated to the Spring and Autumn Warring States Period more than two thousands years ago.
sentences.chinese: 湘绣历史悠久，可追溯到二千多年前的春秋战国时期。

sentences.english: The Warring States era, a father and his son off to fight.
sentences.chinese: 春秋战国时代，一位父亲和他的儿子出征打战。

sentences.english: The music person community of Chunqiu and Zhanguo period, has the different characteristics than previously.
sentences.chinese: 春秋战国的音乐人群体，具有不同以往的许多特征。

sentences.english: Period was a golden age of Chinese ideology.
sentences.chinese: 春秋战国时期是中国思想史的黄金时代。

definition: the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods/Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4

definition: pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
the Warring States period (475-221 BC)/Japanese Warring States period (15th-17th century)
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
